questions.quote: I'm okay. I'm fine. I'm wonderful. I never felt better in my whole life.
Well, I think of you as part of my family. You've come to be like a daughter to me and I want to make sure you're taken care of after I'm gone.
I must've had at least eight in my mouth. I couldn't talk. I couldn't talk!
What a sale, huh? And how about that store, delivering it tonight? We're gonna be swimming in 'thank you's...
Oh hey, by the way. Do you want a box 'a, Cuban cigars? I smoked one last night. I got nauseous.
So chasing little kids huh? You're in a lot of trouble mister.
Oh, sure. Of course, you're entitled. Who doesn't want this, that, and the other?
I'm sorry I don't have a square to spare, now if you don't mind
'Cause I'm on a special diet, and the doctor said I can't have any fat.
So anyway, he sings, he dances. And do you know what he's gotten into now? He is cooking! He does a crepe...
